title: Power Consumption (Historical)
description: Long-term historical power monitoring from InfluxDB. Note: Daily panels require multi-day time ranges for meaningful data.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "prometheus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "node_rapl_package_joules_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source_host =~ /${host:regex}/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["source_host"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "source_host"])
  |> yield(name: "cpu_power")

from(bucket: "prometheus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "node_hwmon_power_average_watt")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.sensor == "power1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source_host =~ /${host:regex}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["source_host"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "source_host"])
  |> yield(name: "gpu_power")

panels.title: Daily Energy Cost (Actual)
panels.description: Actual daily energy cost calculated by multiplying hourly power consumption with the electricity price at that hour

targets.query:
import "date"
import "experimental"

// Get hourly average power in watts, truncate to hour boundary
power = from(bucket: "prometheus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "node_rapl_package_joules_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source_host =~ /${host:regex}/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: r._time, unit: 1h)}))
  |> group(columns: ["source_host", "_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["source_host"])

// Get hourly price, truncate to hour boundary
price = from(bucket: "prometheus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "electricity_price_nok_per_kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.tax == "incl_mva")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: r._time, unit: 1h)}))
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> mean()
  |> group()

// Join power and price, calculate hourly cost, then sum per day
experimental.join(
  left: power,
  right: price,
  fn: (left, right) => ({left with price: right._value})
)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 * r.price}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["source_host"])
  |> yield(name: "daily_cost")

panels.title: Hourly Cost Over Time
panels.description: Cost rate (NOK/hour) based on actual power consumption and electricity price

targets.query:
import "date"
import "experimental"

// Get power in watts, aggregated to 1h windows
power = from(bucket: "prometheus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "node_rapl_package_joules_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.source_host =~ /${host:regex}/)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: r._time, unit: 1h)}))
  |> group(columns: ["source_host", "_time"])
  |> sum()
  |> group(columns: ["source_host"])

// Get electricity price, aggregated to 1h windows
price = from(bucket: "prometheus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "electricity_price_nok_per_kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.tax == "incl_mva")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.truncate(t: r._time, unit: 1h)}))
  |> group(columns: ["_time"])
  |> mean()
  |> group()

// Join and calculate cost rate (NOK/hour)
experimental.join(
  left: power,
  right: price,
  fn: (left, right) => ({left with price: right._value})
)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 * r.price}))  // kW * NOK/kWh = NOK/hour
  |> group(columns: ["source_host"])
  |> yield(name: "cost_rate")
